name: TeslaPWControl
description: Nodeserver to allow integration of Tesla Power Wall Control.  ShortPoll updates critical data and  heartbeat, long poll is for all data.
notice: Uses APIs from https://github.com/jrester/tesla_powerwall and https://tesla-api.timdorr.com/ - not official Tesla APIs.

credits.title: A NodeServer to integrate Tesla Power Wall Controll system
credits.author: Panda88CO
